## ðŸ”¹ Predictive Maintenance for Electric Vehicles
**Category:** Operations

**Description:** Implement machine learning models to predict vehicle maintenance needs based on usage patterns and sensor data.

**Why It Matters:** Reduces downtime and enhances customer trust in vehicle reliability.

**Resources:**
- [Predictive Maintance using ML and LSTM RNN - Kaggle](//duckduckgo.com/l/?uddg=https://www.kaggle.com/code/cedricherbeck/predictive-maintance-using-ml-and-lstm-rnn&amp;rut=798f6ce3a5d49909df8e143ee82ca496e306291c6b797967f1dd1652862b8426)
- [Machine Predictive Maintenance Classification | Kaggle](//duckduckgo.com/l/?uddg=https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/shivamb/machine-predictive-maintenance-classification&amp;rut=d9df7fe85992920bbb70397ecc3e9f0eb860a13e9ad7bc98e1cc2c69cfda5e52)
- [Predictive Maintenance - Kaggle](//duckduckgo.com/l/?uddg=https://www.kaggle.com/code/mhadani/predictive-maintenance&amp;rut=e0fc40d92d80e4008d2b6781fe5f3e2a6493cfda6d98bc25c5af037aa0586185)

**Why It Matters:** Improves sales efficiency and focuses resources on high-potential leads.
